attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has recently commented on the saga between Russel Brand, Jonathan Ross, Andrew Sachs and Georgina Baillie.

We believe that in this day of wars in Iraq, the economy being in a total shambles due to the credit crunch and the Government bailing out banks that can still afford to pay their shareholders huge bonuses that perhaps the prime minister might have more important things to worry about than a prank that has been blown way out of proportion as it is.

We petition the prime minister to focus on the important issues and focus all his attention of getting this country out of the current crisis it is in and less on schoolboy pranks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
